title: Programs allowed to alt + tab you out of game
body:
Is this intentional?

Just had a game where Steam had to update. This normally just pops up infront of my web browser when it happens. But recently I was in game when it happened and it alt tabbed my game. The video drivers crashed at the same time and my OS then crashed as well.

replies.body:
Often when programs are granted Admin privileges, they can both take application focus and sometimes even restart your PC. To prevent this from happening in the future, I strongly recommend closing out any programs that can potentially do this. Alternatively, you can also [complete a clean boot.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3)

Let me know if you have any questions.

Why is it sometimes so hard to alt tab, requiring to keep the button pressed for 40 seconds and having loads of camera bugs upon being back on League? I've found myself using ctrl alt del instead of all tab consistently.
